item.title: We can't wait to meet you at Black Hat Europe on December 7-8, booth #107! Interested in how to improve software security? Debunking some of the CVE myths may help! Learn more: https://resources.github.com/github-blackhat-europe/?utm_source=twitter&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=2023q2-evt-emea-BlackHatEurope_Security_TW #BHEU #security #blackhat

item.title: RT by @github: The US Senate votes on marriage equality this week. GitHub is proud to support the #RespectforMarriageAct because we're committed to inclusion, equality, and standing up for the rights of our employees, developers, and their communities. Join us. http://hrc.im/MarriageEquality
item.dc:creator: @GitHubPolicy

item.title: Cloud-based development offers speed, agility, security, and enhanced collaboration. GitHub Free and Pro plan users can now unlock all of this with 60 hours per month of free Codespaces usage. See what else is new and how you can start building in seconds. https://github.blog/2022-11-10-whats-new-with-codespaces-from-github-universe-2022/
item.dc:creator: @github
